medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 24 hours prior to presentation. The patient describes the pain as significantly different from previous episodes of crampy abdominal pain, which have been persistent. There is a noted decrease in appetite, chills experienced the previous evening (no temperature recorded), and persistent mild nausea throughout the duration.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of chronic pain after an auto accident several years ago; history of oophorectomy and C-sections.
